0.9.name: wordpress/tinymce-options-override
0.9.description:
Allows an Administrator to override the TinyMCE styling options a user can use when creating or editing a post, now on a global and per-user basis.

Any feedback is greatly appreciated:- team@inmeres.com

Change Log and Bug Fixes

1.0.2

  • More user-friendly names and icons for the options in the settings

1.0.1

  • Fixed bug that didn't allow Administrator to set a User's personal TinyMCE Options

1.0

  • Set TinyMCE Options on a per-user basis
  • Small aesthetic changes

0.9

  • Choose which options will appear on TinyMCE toolbars when editing a page or post
